1.content:
The Emptiness is a desolate lonely place. The remains of a human civilization that was extinguished long ago. In it's place are sentient rag dolls known as stitchpunks who have been brought to life by infusion of segments of a human soul via a magical item known as the Talisman.

Pockets of stitch-communities are scattered throughout the Emptiness, many in isolation from one another but some in casual contact. Machines also prowl the desolate wastelands as semi-feral beasts. Often, they do not attack stitchpunks villages due to the now increased numbers of their population, but some still dare to invade and steal away with one or two citizens every so often, sometimes, but not always to be seen again.

The master of the machines, the B.R.A.I.N. (Or Mr. Fab as he is casually referred to by citizens) resides in a large, dilapidated factory in the center of the ruins of an abandoned battlefield where the mechanical beasts patrol regularly. Despite having returned from the dead years ago after having been deactivated for years, he has remained mostly neutral himself towards the stitchpunks despite his growing man power. Rumours spread throughout the colonies that he is planning some sort of mass psychological, or even chemical attack against the stitchpunks, mainly backed by the increasingly strange clouds and faint, but audible pulsing noise originating from the Factory.

Many have grown accustomed to this oddity though, as it has been this way for years now and nothing has yet to happen to them....... until this day.

With the stage set (and keeping in mind that this is still mainly for pornographic and fetish purposes), Who would you like your story to focus upon?
1.title: The Emptiness

info.brief_description: The characters from 9 show off a much naughtier side of themselves. (Anything goes)
info.description:
This is an adult interactive story, where anything goes. You can write as either the main characters, your own OC or from the perspective of the machines. Anything goes in this story, whatever your little heart wants to see them doing can go in here. ^^

One thing about writing sex though, I'm aware that soul bonding is a popular method of writing stitch-sex, and it's fine in here, but I'm going to make actual genitalia (I.E. Rod and Cylinder) mandatory for a bit of a more mainstream feel.

Oh, and NO ONE SENTENCE ENTRIES. Unless it's to add more options under an "Other" choice or to decide on preferences. So that means nothing like "He got on top of her and they had lots of hot sex" for the whole entry. Just be descriptive. ^^


With that said, good luck and happy writing/reading/fapping!
